metadata.header_path: /FORM 10-K/Part I/Item 1A - Risk Factors/Business and Industry Risks/
aws::graph::propositions: Factors Affecting Amazon's Operating Results Related to China-Based Entities
China-based sellers account for significant portions of Amazon's third-party seller services revenues.
China-based sellers account for significant portions of Amazon's advertising revenues.
China-based suppliers provide significant portions of Amazon's components.
China-based suppliers provide significant portions of Amazon's finished goods.
Regulatory restrictions negatively impacting China-based sellers could adversely affect Amazon's operating results.
Regulatory restrictions negatively impacting China-based suppliers could adversely affect Amazon's operating results.
Trade restrictions negatively impacting China-based sellers could adversely affect Amazon's operating results.
Trade restrictions negatively impacting China-based suppliers could adversely affect Amazon's operating results.
Data protection laws negatively impacting China-based sellers could adversely affect Amazon's operating results.
Data protection laws negatively impacting China-based suppliers could adversely affect Amazon's operating results.
Cybersecurity laws negatively impacting China-based sellers could adversely affect Amazon's operating results.
Cybersecurity laws negatively impacting China-based suppliers could adversely affect Amazon's operating results.
Economic factors negatively impacting China-based sellers could adversely affect Amazon's operating results.
Economic factors negatively impacting China-based suppliers could adversely affect Amazon's operating results.
Geopolitical events negatively impacting China-based sellers could adversely affect Amazon's operating results.
Geopolitical events negatively impacting China-based suppliers could adversely affect Amazon's operating results.
Security issues negatively impacting China-based sellers could adversely affect Amazon's operating results.
Security issues negatively impacting China-based suppliers could adversely affect Amazon's operating results.

Regulatory restrictions negatively impacting China-based sellers could adversely affect Amazon's operating results.

Trade restrictions negatively impacting China-based suppliers could adversely affect Amazon's operating results.
Data protection laws negatively impacting China-based sellers could adversely affect Amazon's operating results.
Data protection laws negatively impacting China-based suppliers could adversely affect Amazon's operating results.
Cybersecurity laws negatively impacting China-based sellers could adversely affect Amazon's operating results.
Cybersecurity laws negatively impacting China-based suppliers could adversely affect Amazon's operating results.
Economic factors negatively impacting China-based sellers could adversely affect Amazon's operating results.
Economic factors negatively impacting China-based suppliers could adversely affect Amazon's operating results.
Geopolitical events negatively impacting China-based sellers could adversely affect Amazon's operating results.

metadata.header_path: /FORM 10-K/Part I/Item 1A - Risk Factors/Business and Industry Risks/
/FORM 10-K/Part I/Item 1A - Risk Factors/Business and Industry Risks/

text: In addition, because China-based sellers account for significant portions of our third-party seller services and advertising revenues, and China-based suppliers provide significant portions of our components and finished goods, regulatory and trade restrictions, data protection and cybersecurity laws, economic factors, geopolitical events, security issues, or other factors negatively impacting China-based sellers and suppliers could adversely affect our operating results.
